hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd genomic-etl-infrastructure aws s3 cp s3://${output_s3_bucket}/genomic-etl/deployment_state_metadata/subnet_variables.tf . aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 900 --role-arn $arn_role_cnc --role-session-name "teardown-genomic-etl" > assume-role-output.txt
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
aws ec2 describe-instances --region us-east-1 --filters Name=tag-value,Values="Genomic ETL Annotation Pipeline - ${study_id}${consent_group_tag} Chromosome ${chrom_number}" Name=instance-state-name,Values=running >instance_description_${study_id}${consent_group_tag}_${chrom_number}.json aws ec2 terminate-instances --region us-east-1 --instance-ids `jq -r '.Reservations|.[0]|.Instances|.[0]|.InstanceId' instance_description_${study_id}${consent_group_tag}_${chrom_number}.json` || echo 'No instance to terminate'
unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN
aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 900 --role-arn $arn_role_cnc --role-session-name "teardown-genomic-etl" > assume-role-output.txt
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
aws s3 rm --recursive s3://${output_s3_bucket}/genomic-etl/deployment_state_metadata/${study_id}${consent_group_tag}/${chrom_number}/ || echo 'No config files to delete'
unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN
aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 1800 --role-arn $arn_role_cnc --role-session-name "teardown-genomic-etl" > assume-role-output.txt
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
aws ec2 wait instance-terminated --region us-east-1 --instance-ids `jq -r '.Reservations|.[0]|.Instances|.[0]|.InstanceId' instance_description_${study_id}${consent_group_tag}_${chrom_number}.json` || echo 'No instance to terminate'
unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN
aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 900 --role-arn $arn_role_cnc --role-session-name "teardown-genomic-etl" > assume-role-output.txt
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
aws ec2 describe-security-groups --region us-east-1 --filters Name=vpc-id,Values="vpc-04b9151257af31e0e" Name=group-name,Values="allow_outbound_to_public_internet_to_genomic_etl_${deployment_git_hash}_${study_id}${consent_group_tag}-${chrom_number}" --query 'SecurityGroups[*].[GroupId]' --output text >sec_description_1_${study_id}${consent_group_tag}_${chrom_number}.json aws ec2 describe-security-groups --region us-east-1 --filters Name=vpc-id,Values="vpc-04b9151257af31e0e" Name=group-name,Values="allow_traffic_from_genomic_etl_to_ssm_${deployment_git_hash}_${study_id}${consent_group_tag}-${chrom_number}" --query 'SecurityGroups[*].[GroupId]' --output text >sec_description_2_${study_id}${consent_group_tag}_${chrom_number}.json aws ec2 delete-security-group --region us-east-1 --group-id `cat sec_description_1_${study_id}${consent_group_tag}_${chrom_number}.json` || echo 'No security group to delete' aws ec2 delete-security-group --region us-east-1 --group-id `cat sec_description_2_${study_id}${consent_group_tag}_${chrom_number}.json`|| echo 'No security group to delete'
unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN
